comments: Professor Barshooi is exceptionally engaging as an educator. He knows every student by name, and makes an effort to get to know them, and find out exactly what each individual\'s learning style is. This was not a class where I simply memorized the material, Professor Barshooi makes you internalize it. Math intensive Physics- here I come.

comments: Professor Barshooi is absolutely amazing. He introduces material very fluently and understandable. If you do not understand a topic he will make sure to go back and explain it step by step. His class is fun and interactive, but of course make sure to do your work and be a good student so you can get a good grade. He is also very flexible!
